  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120292</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120292</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določi pospešek</string>
            <string language="en">Determine the acceleration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie die Beschleunigung fest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez l'accélération</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine o acceleration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini l'accelerazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε την ταχύτητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine la aceleración</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Raketa pospešuje navzgor, ko iz strani izstrelimo kroglo vanjo.</string>
            <string language="en">The rocket is accelerating straight up when it is interrupted by a bullet that was fired upon it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pospešek</string>
            <string language="en">acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">težnost</string>
            <string language="en">gravitation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Rakete beschleunigt gerade oben, wenn sie 
durch eine Gewehrkugel unterbrochen wird, die nach ihr abgefeuert 
wurde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fusée accélère directement vers le haut 
quand elle est interrompue par une balle qui a été mise le feu sur 
elle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O foguete está acelerando em linha reta acima 
quando é interrompido por uma bala que esteja ateada fogo em cima 
dele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il razzo sta accelerare diritto in su quando è 
interrotto da una pallottola che è stata infornata su esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πύραυλος επιταχύνει κατ' ευθείαν επάνω πότε 
διακόπτεται από μια σφαίρα που βάλθηκε φωτιά επάνω σε τον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cohete está acelerando derecho para arriba 
cuando es interrumpido por un punto negro que fue encendido sobre él.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschleunigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">accélération</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attraction universelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gravitação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">accelerazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gravitazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταχύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαρύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aceleración</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravitación</string>
          </keyword>
